text: Arthur James Summons (13 December 1935 â€“ 16 May 2020) was an Australian representative rugby union and rugby league player. He captained the Australian national rugby league team in five undefeated test matches from 1962 until 1964 and later also coached the side. He was born in Paddington, New South Wales. Summons died on 16 May 2020 in Wagga Wagga, New South Wales at the age of 84.Rugby league great Arthur Summons dies aged 84 ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Australian rugby union players Category:Australian rugby league players Category:Rugby union players from Sydney Category:Rugby league players from Sydney
title: Arthur Summons
